attributes.action: Listen to Expert Advice on Drug Classification
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition government and Prime Minister to either listen to the advice provided by the Advisory Council on the Mis-use of Drugs, or explain in detail why the Prime Minister is disregarding the information they provide, and in doing so risking further harm to UK citizens by pursuing an asymetric and unbalanced drug policy.  We would also like the Prime Minister to provide evidence that he is more qualified to make a serious descision on drugs policy, than a council of experts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
